body_html: @ezyang yeah, in terms of Blob->Tensor it's the same, this diff is useful for changing Blob to IValue, because right now IValue have to store a Blob -> Tensor and with this diff IValue can store IValue -> intrusive_ptr to TensorImpl. cc @smessmer for more details.
body_text: @ezyang yeah, in terms of Blob->Tensor it's the same, this diff is useful for changing Blob to IValue, because right now IValue have to store a Blob -> Tensor and with this diff IValue can store IValue -> intrusive_ptr to TensorImpl. cc @smessmer for more details.
body: @ezyang yeah, in terms of Blob->Tensor it's the same, this diff is useful for changing Blob to IValue, because right now IValue have to store a Blob -> Tensor and with this diff IValue can store IValue -> intrusive_ptr to TensorImpl. cc @smessmer for more details.
